content.question: In the middle of the third paragraph, the author sets off the phrase “surely a product of coastal erosion and the grinding of surf” with em dashes primarily to

choices.label: insert a definition into her discussion of geological processes
note why the location of the sand deposits is considered unusual
counterbalance her use of interrogation marks in the following sentences
admit that modern theories about the movement of tides explain the location of sand deposits

content.answer: note why the location of the sand deposits is considered unusual

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
